name: MFGG Vault: New Super Mario Kart
name_original: MFGG Vault: New Super Mario Kart
description:
Original Description:

This is my second game and my first 3D game. It's a mode 7 like copy off SMK from SNES, with my own additions. Now three cups are avaible the basic characters and 12 unlockable characters. 20 IN TOTAL!! Also the Mega Mushroom and the Mini Mushroom, bomb, thunder,.. and many more items are avaible! Have fun!
